    Introducing the latest Samsung Galaxy, the S9 Series

    S9 Series, Galaxy's Camera Features

    The new Samsug Galaxy S9 series, the camera reimagined. The Camera that works with your eye. The Camera that turns you into an emoji. A remarkable phone for the reimagined camera.

    S9 Series, How the Galaxy Works

    The new Galaxy can, Display. Screen size (inches) 5.80. Touchscreen, Hardware. Processor. octa-core (4x2.7GHz + 4x1.7GHz) Processor make. Camera. Rear camera. 12-megapixel (1.4-micron).

    Galaxy Pricing

    The Samsung Galaxy S9 pricing depends on the S9 series model you choose. There are three new S9 series model, the S9 Galaxy, S9+ Galaxy and the Galaxy Note 9. Software. Operating system. Android 8.0.

    Samsung Note 9
    Samsung Galaxy S9
    Samsung Galaxy S9+
    S9 Galaxy

    Starting MSRP $720

    1. Dimensions: 5.81 x 2.70 x 0.33 in. Weight: 5.75 oz
    2. Display: 5.8" Quad HD+ Super AMOLED (2960x1440) 570 ppi
    3. Camera: OIS (Optical Image Stabilization), Digital zoom up to 8x, Selective Focus (background blur effect)
    4. Memory: 4GB RAM, 64GB
    S9+ Galaxy

    Starting MSRP $840

    1. Dimensions: 6.22 x 2.91 x 0.33 in. Weight: 6.67 oz
    2. Display: 6.2" Quad HD+ Super AMOLED (2960x1440) 529 ppi
    3. Camera: Dual camera, Dual OIS (Optical Image Stabilization), Optical zoom at 2x, Digital zoom up to 10x, Live Focus with bokeh filters (background blur effect), Dual Capture
    4. Memory: 6GB RAM, 64GB
    Galaxy Note 9

    Starting MSRP $999

    1. Dimensions: 6.37 x 3.01 x 0.35 in, Weight: 7.09 oz
    2. Display: 6.4" Quad HD+ Super AMOLED (2960x1440), 516 ppi
    3. Camera: Wide-angle, Super Speed Dual Pixel 12MP AF sensor, Sensor size: 1/2.55", Pixel Size: 1.4µm, Sensor ratio: 4:3, FOV: 77˚, Dual Aperture: F1.5 mode/ F2.4 mode
    4. Memory: 6GB RAM, 128GB
